titleInfo.title: A group of people gather in front of a circus sideshow attraction at the Tennessee State Fair, Nashville, Tennessee, 1931

location.physicalLocation: Special Collections Division of the Nashville Public Library, 615 Church Street, Nashville, Tennessee, 37219

mods.abstract: Photograph of a group of people standing at a circus booth during the Tennessee State Fair in 1931. The fair ran from September 21 to September 26 and featured attractions like the Dutton Circus. The circus was free to anyone who paid the fair admission price of 50 cents per adult and 25 cents per child. Forms part of the Nashville Room Historic Photographs Collection. 1 photograph : b & w ; 8 x 10 in.
mods.accessCondition: U.S. and international copyright laws protect this digital content, which is provided for educational purposes only and may not be downloaded, reproduced, or distributed for any other purpose without written permission. Please contact the Special Collections Division of the Nashville Public Library, 615 Church Street, Nashville, Tennessee, 37219. Telephone (615) 862-5782.
